author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we’re testing Official Steam OS on a budget SFF (small form factor) we recently built! This compact and affordable build can handle 1080p and even 1440p gaming while keeping power consumption low and the footprint tiny—perfect for couch gaming!
